articles.title: 3rd session of 10th Supreme People's Assembly to be convened
Nigerian ambassador presents credentials to Kim Yong Nam
articles.content:
3rd session of 10th Supreme People's Assembly to be convened 
    Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- The 3rd session of the 10th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK will be convened n Pyongyang on April 4, Juche 89 (2000) according to the article 110 of the socialist constitution of the DPRK, said the March 14 decree of the presidium of the SPA of the DPRK.
